filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽 Look Back Sunday 回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞我們這週來聽聽德國的趣聞吧Let's get right to it!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: One creature's droppings can be another's treasure as Germany's Crone Circus is finding out during the new coronavirus pandemic.Home to 26 lions and tigers, the circus has found an unusual side income and raised money despite coronavirus-related restrictions, selling jars of big cats' droppings.Customers have told lion tamer Martin Lacey they swear by the stuff.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: The jars sell for 5 euros each, with some of the money going towards a charity to improve the living conditions of captive animals.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Berlin's brothels were allowed to reopen last week after months of closure due to coronavirus restrictions, but full-on sex is still off-limits.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Sex work had been banned in Berlin since mid-March as part of efforts to control the spread of the coronavirus.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Sausage vending machines booming in Germany
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Vending machines sell three or four types of sausages and punnets of accompanying potato salad, so customers can buy all they need for a traditional hearty German feast anytime.There are over 570,000 vending machines in Germany, but despite their popularity, they are expected to complement, rather than replace traditional shops.Vending machines will play a complementary role in brick and
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: mortar retailing.Wolfgang Kampmeyer of the Berlin Brandenburg Trade Association told the Berliner Zeitung newspaper.Slow music Court change in Germany of 639 year organ pieceHundreds of fans attended a special kind of musical happening on September 5th at a church in Germany.A court change in an organ piece that is
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: supposed to last for an entirety of 639 years.The performance of the organ 2 slash ASLSP or as slow as possible composition began in September 2001 at the St.Bacardi Church in the eastern town of Halberstadt and is supposed to end in 2640 if all goes well.The music piece by the American composer John Cage is
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: played on a special organ inside the medieval church.The last sound has been the same one for the last 6 years and 11 months, and therefore the court change on Saturday last week was a big event among fans of the John Cage organ project.A court change means that the sound of the organ pipes change either because new sounds are added or existing sounds end.On September 5th, two new organ pipes were added.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Organizers say the performance is one of the slowest realizations of an organ musical piece.A compressor in the basement creates energy to blow air into the organ to create continuous sound.When a court change happens, it is done manually.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: The next court change is planned for February 5th, 2022, the German news agency DPA reported.When the piece officially started on September 5th, 2001, it began without any sound.It was only on February 5th, 2003, the day of the first court change that the first organ pipe chords could actually be heard inside the church.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Cage was born in Los Angeles in 1912 and died in New York in 1992.He is known not only as a composer but also as a music theorist, artist and philosopher.The St.Brecati Church has a long checkered history.It was built around 1050 and was used for more than 600 years as a Cistercian monastery.It was partially destroyed during the Thirty Years' War.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: Later rebuilt, at some point secularized and over the centuries also served as a barn, a distillery and a pigsty, the John Cage Organ Project said on its website.Court changes usually draw several thousand visitors to Haberstadt.But because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the number of guests allowed into the church was limited this year.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 德國相關時事趣聞 All about Germany.json

chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎到我們官網 www.15mens.today有興趣 John 老師以及其他資深英語老師對談的節目,記得週末也要回來收聽我們同情學英語!Catch you in the next one!
